resources.string: Note that existing cases or used cases should not be entered
"Use the keypad or keyboard to generate cases; Continuous input can generate five cases at most"
"Click the CPI+/- button on the top of the Black Shark gaming mouse to directly adjust the mouse sensitivity "
Tap to set cooling mode and lighting mode.
Shark Cooler is in low battery level.
After open switch body feeling left and right, to adapt to different games
After open the body feeling, body feeling sensitivity adjustable button, the value, the greater the body feeling more sensitive.
The current battery is too low. To ensure accurate calibration, charge the device.
the Gamepad calibration can solve the problem of incorrect rocker direction. Please complete the calibration within 30 seconds.
1. Do not operate the joystick during calibration
2. Stand-alone Gamepad LT button (see the upper left corner of the base image) activates the Gamepad calibration mode
Operation timeout. Exited the calibration mode
Within 30 seconds, click the LT button to activate the calibration mode
Can solve problems such as incorrect direction of the joystick, please do not operate other keys during the process
Please make sure Shark Cooler is turned on and waked up
Cannot connect to your device. Please try again.
Select your cooling mode when Shark Cooler is connected successfully.
"1. Insert the charging port of the phone into the Shark Cooler Type-c 2. Pull the upper structure of Shark Cooler to maximum 3. Fasten the upper part of the phone into Shark Cooler"

New version available for right gamepad

Support the full series of Black Shark handles

"Click touchpad to click; double-click to drag"
Game mouse manual instructions(Priority switch to player mode)
When the left Gamepad is connected, LB click + slide
"Double click on any area of the touchpad and slide Touchpad"
Press and hold to take effect
After turning this feature on, if you need to click or drag, hold down the RB or RT button.
The right Gamepad adds game mouse, and no need to touch screen to play. see it.
Game mouse can click and drag without touching screen
This feature is only available when the right Gamepad is connected
Check your network settings and click Refresh to try again
90° rotation of the joystick direction,start the game with both hands holding the left Gamepad
Only supports second generation left Gamepad, first generation Gamepad, second generation right Gamepad and the game com.tencent.tmgp.pubgmhd do not support this function.
Set the Gamepad button function mapping
"The smaller the value, the easier it is to recognize the slight slip; the larger the value, the less the finger's jitter will not be recognized."
The smaller the value, the more stable the picture in the slide; the larger the value, the more timely the response in the slide
Parameters can be set when the right Gamepad is connected
请选择按键对应指令（操作手柄按键可快速切换焦点）
Edit the key mapping of Joystick with this function in the game
手柄设置按《和平精英外设接入方案》定制
游戏暂不支持右手柄单独使用，请先连接左手柄
开车时，方向键可以控制车辆的前后左右，LT可用于车辆加速
和平精英仅能接入一个手柄，右侧手柄仍需映射方式设置按键（右侧手柄不能单独使用）
必知：点击「和平精英」设置按钮，在「基础设置」中点击「连接外设」即可使用.
Drag keys onto the game button and tap the handle button to trigger the mapping
"After setting the LT key to physical sensation, press and hold the LT to shake the handle, n you can detect the field of vision or aim and other operations"
You can press the joystick to try to trigger the button
How to set the map button
Gamepad 3 has an additional joystick press key L3
The current Gamepad is in horizontal hold mode
After enabling Somatosensory control, press and hold this key to shake the handle to change the angle of view in the game to perform operations such as aiming or turning.
gamepad model has switch, please reconnect
Under the condition of shoulder key module inserted，[S1] and [S2] is available
Gamepad 3 Support the shoulder key module
The horizontal play mode of the Gamepad is enabled, which makes fighting game experience better

"In a game, swipe down from the top left or top right corner of the screen to call Gamer Studio. Tap Device Online at the bottom and select Button Setting to start button configuration; You may also press Ctrl+Alt on the keyboard to call the button setting function interface."
You can drag the cases to the corresponding function buttons in game based on your habit. The setting takes effect when you press the X button.
"The keyboard is equipped with an USB interface on one side for connection to a wireless mouse. The default mouse is Black Shark Gaming Mouse. A third-party mouse is also supported."
The current Bluetooth headset power is too low. To ensure a smooth update, please charge your device
Monochrome light effect of the headset during normal operation
Switch failed, please check if the headset link is normal or reconnect the headset
Normal mode when game mode is off
After the game mode is turned on, the delay of the Bluetooth headset will be greatly reduced
The current %1$s Gamepad is in horizontal hold mode
Shark Code不适用于当前系统版本，请更新系统
Drag the virtual button to customize the mapping area
Generate multiple keys and configure macro actions
Keyboard portrait mode is not available
This key already exists, try another key
Attention, not to enter keys which are already used or occupied
Do not use high-frequency keys such as WASD or left and right mouse keys
The battery of the left Gamepad is low
Fn + Esc quickly turn off/on lighting effects
Some lighting effects default to full-color matching, non-switchable color matching
A total of 10 lighting effects modes
Battle entrance: single player mode-local battle
Note: Need to install shoulder key module to use
The dual controllers are connected, and experience the two-player battle immediately

"P1 is the main game controller, which takes effect globally, and P2 is the secondary controller only takes effect in the game, not the game lobby. Install the shoulder button module to use the Ultimate Skill and Menu Button, as shown in the figure below."
Two-player battle mode: game lobby-single player mode-local battle
When connecting double handle, click any key of handle to quickly identify
Press and hold S1 and S2 at the same time for two seconds to turn on/off
Due to product batch differences, some shoulder keys have S1/S2 swaps
Metal duel supports multiple ways of playing
You need to install the handle shoulder button module to use the ultimate skills and menu buttons, as shown in the figure below.
Button mapping, as shown in the figure below.
No additional mapping settings, just connect and play
Metal duel and Black Shark handle complete deep customization
No additional settings required, you can enjoy the mobile game experience with the handle
Support multiple gameplays such as dual gamepads on the same machine
No additional settings required, you can enjoy the mobile game experience with the handle
Connect another controller to experience a two-player battle
Long press S1 + S2 for 2 seconds to quickly switch to horizontal play mode
Install the shoulder button module, you can experience horizontal play
When anti-misoperation is enabled, quickly and repeatedly tapping the touch button will temporarily validate
Chip-cooler works on high power mode, suitable for large games and Ludicrous Mode.
Chip-cooler works on low power mode, suitable for simple games.
please check your network, open the location service, make sure device is connected and battery level is > 40%.
No need set key map for this game
This is the latest APP version.
Black Shark Cooling Case only applies to 「Black Shark Gaming Phone 2」.Other phones cannot get the best effect.
You are using a mobile network. Updates consume data. Do you want to continue?
Bluetooth connection needs to obtain the precise location information of this device to discover the Bluetooth device, to open the location permission
Tap the left handle circle key
Access photos,media and files on your device
Recommend to charge Shark Cooler while using it. The mobile phone can be charged as well.
Press「One-shot cooling」button of Shark Cooler to cool your phone down quickly. You can set feedback effects from APP settings.
Recommend you to use Smart mode, balancing cooling efficiency and battery for better endurance time.
Keyboard key setting \"Game for peace\" external program development
"Click the [Setting] button of \"Game for peace\", and click [Connect Peripheral] in [Basic Connection]. Only after successful connection can you use the following key schemes"

1. The upper and lower wings of the back clip can be stretched. When installing the back clip, you can clip either side of the back clip to the side of the phone, and then stretch it to clamp the phone with the other side of the back clip.Align the cooling chip position of the back clip with the location of the mobile phone battery to maximize the cooling efficiency;
2. When you start using the back clip, you need to connect the back clip to a power supply or a computer through a USB cable. Turn on the back clip switch and you can start using it;
3. After connecting to the phone via Bluetooth, you can update the firmware or modify the light effect of the back clip in the equipment box;
4. Because the work efficiency of the back clip is directly affected by the power supply, such as the power of the power is less than 5V2A, The back clip will not work properly.
Installation and connection of the Cooler
Version update requires the permission to obtain the mobile phone information. (Please manually enable the permission-obtain the mobile phone information.)
The battery of the right Gamepad is low

In a game, swipe down from the top left or top right corner of the screen to call Gamer Studio. Tap Device Online at the bottom and select Button Setting in the handle card to start button configuration;
You may also press the function button on the Gamepad to call the mapping, and select the Settings button in the upper right corner to start button configuration.
You can drag the cases to the corresponding function buttons in game based on your habit. The setting takes effect when you press the X button.

"The working power of Shark Cooler is subject to the maximum power of the charger you use. n. When the enhanced mode is enabled, Shark Cooler cools according to the maximum output power of the charger. n. After the enhanced mode is disabled, Shark Cooler will cool at the default power"
Working description of the 2nd generation Shark Cooler
After unbinding, Shark Cooler will not be automatically connected. Do you want to unbind?
Set feedback when pressing the button
"Shark Cooler's Logo light and phone's light (need to be turned on) have exclusive lighting effect"
Phone sounds when pressing the button
Phone vibrates when pressing the button
During a game, slide the fingerprint key down to display the game Dock. Touch the key settings to configure.
During a game, drag inwards from the upper left or upper right corner of the screen to display the game Dock. Touch the key settings to configure.

During a game, touch the Function Keys to enter the key prompt screen. Then, touch Settings in the upper right corner to enter the key mapping adjustment screen (applicable only to the Black Shark Double-Wing gamepad).
Drag the keys to the corresponding functions based on your preferences. The rocker size can be adjusted. Click Save to validate the modification now.
Bluetooth connection requires access to Location Service. Please turn on Location Service.

Please DO NOT turn device off.
Find new firmware version %s. DO NOT turn it off when updating in progress.
"New gaming controller firmware version available. Size: %dKB. Please keep the gaming controller connected in the process of installation."
Please keep the device connected normally during the update process.
You can drag the key to the delete control to delete the key

In the game, click the middle mouse button, the pointer is displayed, and the click operation can be performed; Click the middle button again, the pointer is hidden, the mouse is used to move the perspective
Click the new button at the top, click the button on the keyboard to add a key
Click Close to automatically save the mapping and complete the key configuration
Peripheral mapping is temporarily unavailable during USB projection
